Name: Lorraine
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Sweet and sour with fruity, herbal notes.
Nutrition: One serving of Lorraine contains 167 calories
